comment._content: The true use of the word Tchataldja is Çatalca. It is in Turkish.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Ozturk:

Thank you very much for the information. We often have alternate spellings in our captions, as well as place names in other languages or variant spellings which have fallen out of use. We can add the name you've provided to the record when we update.
